mapper.sql: id as id, oper_user_id as operUserId, work_id as workId, ou_id as ouId, operation_id as operationId, status as status, is_admin_assign as isAdminAssign, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, created_id as createdId, modified_id as modifiedId, operator_id as operatorId
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_wh_work_oper SET oper_user_id = #{operUserId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , work_id = #{workId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , operation_id = #{operationId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , status = #{status,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , is_admin_assign = #{isAdminAssign,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
and last_modify_time <= #{lastModifyTime}
